Key Arguments: The government should not be the arbiter of truth as it leads to dictatorship.
Freedom of speech and open discussion are essential in a democratic society.
Government has previously disseminated incorrect information, particularly regarding Covid-19.
Censorship stifles robust discussion and can prevent challenges to misinformation from the government itself.
Conspiracy theories sometimes arise from incomplete government information and have been proven true over time.
Notable Quotes: A Government or Government agency which is a centralised authority who determines what is true or false is a dictatorship.
In a free and democratic society we must have the freedom to have open and frank discussion, opinion and expression in any media that is available.
These proposed amendments are truly censorious and censorship stifles robust discussion.
